In this paper there are houses for sale.A spacious semi detached house in a popular estate backing onto private gardens.Hall,lounge/diner,kitchen,sepe rate WC.Fitted carpets included.Pleasant front and rear gardens.Cost Â£26.500,in Westfield. A second hand Vauxhall Cavalier SRI which was new in October 1983, has a sunroof, a stereo radio cassette. 20,000 miles on the clock and costs Â£4.500.
